product_name: Eagle Creek RFID Catch-All Courier Bag
long_description: Sized to fit a 13-inch laptop, the Eagle Creek RFID Catch-All Courier Bag also converts to a backpack with hidden straps and gives you smart anti-theft features. 2 carry options: adjustable, padded cross-body shoulder strap or padded mesh backpack straps that zip away when not needed. Features Eagle Creek All Ways Secure(TM) system, which includes a passport-size RFID-blocking pocket to help prevent ID theft by illicit scanning devices. Reflective trim and a loop for a blinking light (not included) enhance your visibility in dim light. Padded sleeve for a 13 in. laptop and an electronics pocket are lined with soft fleece. Internal organization includes slip pockets, zippered pocket, pen slots and key fob. Zippered front pocket and 2 mesh water bottle pockets stow items quickly. Eagle Creek RFID Catch-All Courier Bag offers a top grab handle for easy lifting.
short_description: Sized to fit a 13-inch laptop, the Eagle Creek RFID Catch-All Courier Bag also converts to a backpack with hidden straps and gives you smart anti-theft features.
